meanings.definition: A period of time marked by distinctive character or events.
meanings.sent1: The dinosaur era was a time when huge creatures roamed the earth.
meanings.sent2: The Victorian era is known for its elegant fashion and manners.
meanings.sent3: In the era of disco, people danced under colorful lights and glittering balls.
meanings.sent4: The era of exploration opened up new worlds and possibilities for adventurers.
meanings.sent5: The era of the Wild West is often romanticized in movies and books.

meanings.definition: A system of chronology dating from a particular event.
meanings.sent1: The Islamic era begins with the migration of Prophet Muhammad to Medina.
meanings.sent2: The Japanese era system is based on the reign of the emperor.
meanings.sent3: In the era of smartphones, keeping track of time has become much easier.
meanings.sent4: The era of the digital age has revolutionized the way we record history.
meanings.sent5: The era of the Renaissance brought about a rebirth of art and culture.
